channel.title: Comments on: White Chocolate and Hazelnut Mud Cake with Hazelnut Macaron and White Chocolate Rings

item.title: By: Nich
item.dc:creator: Nich
item.description: Wow, the cake consistence looks really amazing, it seems to be soooo delicate & moist! I can already imargine how tasty it was, and I'll certainly try to make the same in a short time. Thanks a lot for the recipe.
item.content:encoded: Wow, the cake consistence looks really amazing, it seems to be soooo delicate & moist! I can already imargine how tasty it was, and I’ll certainly try to make the same in a short time. Thanks a lot for the recipe.

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: Happy anniversary! Your cake looks fantastic, especially the white chocolate designs! Very clever to use a craft punch to cut out the flower shapes! Was it messy to clean up?
item.content:encoded: Happy anniversary! Your cake looks fantastic, especially the white chocolate designs! Very clever to use a craft punch to cut out the flower shapes! Was it messy to clean up?

item.title: By: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.dc:creator: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.description: Oh wow what a gorgeous dessert! So clever with the white chocolate shapes too, I'm so impressed :)
item.content:encoded: Oh wow what a gorgeous dessert! So clever with the white chocolate shapes too, I’m so impressed ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Karine
item.dc:creator: Karine
item.description: Your did such an amazing job! Happy Anniversary!
item.content:encoded: Your did such an amazing job! Happy Anniversary!

item.title: By: sophia
item.dc:creator: sophia
item.description: That is the PERFECt cake for a great anniversary! Wow! Your husband must be blessing his lucky stars!
item.content:encoded: That is the PERFECt cake for a great anniversary! Wow! Your husband must be blessing his lucky stars!

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: Happy Anniversay! Lovely macarons, I love your flavor combination. What a gorgeous creation!
item.content:encoded: Happy Anniversay! Lovely macarons, I love your flavor combination. What a gorgeous creation!

item.title: By: Sophie
item.dc:creator: Sophie
item.description:
You are a master in desserts!! this is one fabulous & ooh soo tasty looking dessert!!
MARVELLOUS!!!!
item.content:encoded:
You are a master in desserts!! this is one fabulous & ooh soo tasty looking dessert!!

MARVELLOUS!!!!

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Hi Anita What a beautiful cake. Happy Anniversary to you and your hubby. He is so lucky to have such a great baker/cook for a wife!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita
What a beautiful cake. Happy Anniversary to you and your hubby. He is so lucky to have such a great baker/cook for a wife!

item.title: By: Leona
item.dc:creator: Leona
item.description: Anita your creations are out of this world! This looks like a something from a patisserie. Congrats on the wedding anniversary great way to reminisce especially since you didnt get to have much cake on your day.
item.content:encoded: Anita your creations are out of this world! This looks like a something from a patisserie. Congrats on the wedding anniversary great way to reminisce especially since you didnt get to have much cake on your day.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGouremtChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGouremtChallenge
item.description: Happy anniversary Nick and Anita! What a lovely surprise, from both of you, the cake from you and the flowers from nick! You've done such a lovely job, I wish I was that talented!
item.content:encoded: Happy anniversary Nick and Anita! What a lovely surprise, from both of you, the cake from you and the flowers from nick! You’ve done such a lovely job, I wish I was that talented!
